alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 09 at 12:57PM PDT until October 11 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TUESDAY TO 8 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Antelope Valley Foothills, Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills and Antelope Valley. * WHEN...From 4 PM Tuesday to 8 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Antelope Valley; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
